A multi-stage proportionately stratified random probability sample of the Hungarian population aged 15 or more. The survey was conducted with a diminishing sample method, so the interviewers did not have to find supplementary addresses for the onesthat were dropped out. A supplementary data collection was conducted on 1500 persons because of the decrease of the panel.
